name: Caged (c: Games)
description:
Rescue the caged prisoners! Don't let those enemies touch those levers! Keep them switched off!

Controls

Protagonist: Use the left and right arrow keys to move, and the up arrow key to jump.

Enemy: Use the A and D key to move, and the W key to jump.

If you have an Xbox controller, you can use the left stick to move, and the A button to jump. This applies to both players.

Press any key, or press the Start button on an Xbox controller, to start the game, or to restart the game when it's “Game Over.”
